title: Okay, so this Team Ranked is broken and needs fixing, with lobby and draft.
body:
Me and my friends were in a ranked draft, my client stopped working after I picked and then it said that I failed to pick a champion. I was the first one to pick and Im really certain that it wasn't me. It has happened to me 3 times. 5 min, 30min and now 1 h. It's always me aswell. Can you do anything to remove the "suspension" for leaving a champ select somehow if it wasn't my fault nut it was the clients fault. Really salty atm please I need help :/

Short version: My game froze after I picked and waited to start loading screen but I somehow dodged the draft and now I have 1 hour penalty after 3 times. 5 min, 30 min and 1 hour.

replies.body:
We're not able to modify penalties for disconnecting from matches. Because these disconnections negatively impact everyone in the match, regardless of intention, they're treated equally by the system. 

These types of problems are often caused by the client dropping its connection to the server. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common causes of this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
